LanguageData.AK_BackStory_UrsusStudent.description: Like the other members of the Ursus Student Union, {PAWN_nameDef} was originally an ordinary student studying in the Peterheim Middle School, but {PAWN_possessive} peaceful life abruptly ended due to the Chernobog Incident.
LanguageData.AK_BackStory_UrsusStudent.title: U.S.S.G. Member
